formatDescription: DisplayWrite was a word processor software application that IBM developed for the IBM PC and PCjr.DisplayWrite's native file format is based on IBM's DCA (Document Content Architecture) RFT (Revisable Form Text) specification, but with additional structures.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: IBM DisplayWrite DCA Text File
